ID: C18AQDI_00
From: noreply@dewa.gov.ae <noreply@dewa.gov.ae>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-22 06:48
Subject: Final Reminder: Payment of outstanding dues for Acc. 2038029628
--------------------------------------------------


Dear Customer,

Please ensure to settle payment of AED 1,384.42 for Account no. 2038029628 by today, otherwise services will be regretfully disconnected. Pay through www.dewa.ae/pay?ac=2038029628 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/7o5SC9LVMtxWMlYIof5fqMH7p?domain=dewa.ae> .
For more information or inquiries, please contact our Customer Care Centre at customercare@dewa.gov.ae, or call 04 601 9999.

Your happiness is our priority.
Dubai Electricity & Water Authority 






 <https://www.dewa.gov.ae/emailer/greenbill/images/dewa_footer_en.bmp> 	

________________________________
